description.@en:
To ensure the safety of the village, Mootwardens employ skirmisher tactics at range. This keeps both themselves
  and the people theyâ€™ve sworn to protect safe from harm.

effect.@en:
Select one foe in combat. That foe is left Defenseless to all Ranged Attacks and Called
  Shots made with ranged weapons you make against them until they are defeated. You may select another foe once the current one is defeated.
